Personalities and Policies
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher EVO Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q & A: Personalities and Policies
By Lightining on Monday, June 5, 2006 - 08:40 pm:

As you all know there are some personality traits that have good polocies that fit them.

Let's start with:
hot-blooded ; hard
Competivite ; hard

If you have any other good combinations you have noticed, Please post away.

By Lightining on Saturday, June 10, 2006 - 04:03 pm:

Got a few more for the interested.

Combative ; hard
Pascifist ; easy

I can't seem to be able to find a good one for relaxed... yet.

By Lightining on Saturday, June 10, 2006 - 04:38 pm:

Ok, now I have a sound theory on relaxed.

Relaxed ; Easy

This has only been tested on two generations. You might want to try for yourself.

By Lightining on Saturday, June 17, 2006 - 10:00 am:

New info. ok I think i made a small mistake. in my first post I labeled competitive as good with hard. Competitive is good with anything except lenient. Here are a few more.

cool ; doesn't matter gets higher with bonding
Hard worker ; good with all
Delicate ; easy
Clingyl ; easy
Competitive ; all except lenient

By Salokin on Tuesday, August 7, 2007 - 11:47 am:

Not Serious; Easy
